__e: Why? Because that area of the house was empty, apart from Mr Powell and his killer. Everyone else was at the party.
I'm not an idiot, Powell, and this ain't my first day on the job.
The problem here is that both miss powell and you will reach a point where it might be difficult to decide which is reality and which is nightmare:
Well, Mrs. Powell is not going to take me seriously, but you do.
It seems that General Powell will take time to recover.
And that's why we don't have any friends, because as soon as you start getting close to people, you want to tell 'em your secrets, and the powells can't do that.
